Uses of BoardProtocol in exxit
 

Classes in exxit that implement BoardProtocol
 class ExxitGameBoard
          ExxitGameBoard knows all about the game of Exxit, which is played on a heagonal board which is constructed as you play common.hexBoard, which knows about the coordinate system.

Uses of BoardProtocol in online.game
 

Fields in online.game declared as BoardProtocol
 BoardProtocol commonCanvas.dupBoard
          this is left poining to the duplicate board if an error is thrown from verifyGameRecord, so you can use the "show alternate board" to see that the bad duplicate looks like.

Uses of BoardProtocol in plateau.common
 

Classes in plateau.common that implement BoardProtocol
 class PlateauBoard
          the board class contains the actual representation of the board, all of the logic for state transitions and gestures, and most of the logic for drawing pictures the other structures which co-depend on the board are "pstack" representing a stack of pieces, and "piece" representing a single piece.
